alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 1:50PM CDT until May 05 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Simpson County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... Northwestern Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 149 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mendenhall to near Caseyville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Pinola around 155 PM CDT. Sanatorium around 200 PM CDT. Brookhaven around 205 PM CDT. Magee around 210 PM CDT. Clem around 215 PM CDT. Bogue Chitto around 220 PM CDT. Mount Olive, Enterprise and Lone Star around 225 PM CDT. East Lincoln around 230 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln; Simpson
